Worst school, even though i was here a long time ago as a student, this school had the worst teachers and principles. the teachers couldn't pronounce the word "Stool" properly (they pronounced it as "Stole") and if you forget a book, you'd need to stand at the board in a row with the fellow classmates who also forgot the book and each would get a smack from the teacher with either a strong metal ruler and wooden ruler on each of the hands with the most brutal force. if the teacher is not feeling like giving out the smacks, then its the nuns.
trust me, not the school to let your children go to or grow up with!!!

Review:
@ They took our money for three years .! !. entirely no base or plan for the KG's, my younger had nothing for half year in KG1 (started from the scratch after paying to them in another school . as well as other children same time during 12/2014 and 2013).. no letters or numbers recognition @ !!!!! 

@ No books till APRIL for grade 2  ... !!!! @ .... and they said (No books for him although it is PAID)

@ After being in Sunrise American school later in 2014, i discovered they only give 3 practice books while the curriculum is around 12 books !!! can your imagine !!! skip the Social studies curriculum and books ?? ... no Arabic or Deen books ... no computer or proper German study ? all what they hv. are inexperienced staff ...  foreigners but no teachers !!

@ And of course no experienced teachers as they are not insured or formally school ... so they bring housewives and parents to teach .... can you imagine ?? ! !

@ eventually when searching for my elder son papers discovered they have NEVER went or had any affiliation w/ (( the ministry of Education in Hurghada )) !!!! ... and when they know i claim for my son's paper .... they " kick" my son out of the school w/ NO paper or registration at ALL ....  and the ministry knows that as well as the governor .  

THEY ARE FAKE, w/ unqualified management in schooling ! nevertheless, cheat parents who are w/ them !! and only running after money ... and has no principals at all ..... finally the Governor knows they are w/bad reputation and NO SCHOOL at all ...
